description.brief: ROS driver and configuration files for the MiR100 robot

package.description: This repo contains a ROS driver and ROS configuration files (URDF description, Gazebo launch files, move_base config, bringup launch files, message and action descriptions) for the MiR100 (http://www.mobile-industrial-robots.com/de/products/mir100/).
package.author: Martin Günther/martin.guenther@dfki.de
